"Point in Time" Regulation Content
Health Authorities Act
Amalgamation of Regional Health Boards and Community Health Councils
Regulation
B.C. Reg. 338/96
Section 6 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 211/2015, effective November
28, 2016.
Indemnification
6
For the purposes of section 16 of the
Health Authorities Act
, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 180, a regional health board or community
health council may indemnify a former director of a designated
corporation on amalgamation of the designated corporation with the
regional health board or community health council, on the same
basis that applies to directors or former directors of a regional
health board or community health council under section 30 (2) to
(4) of the
Society Act
, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 433
.
[en. B.C. Reg. 366/97.]
